welcome.about: From the foot of Mt. Fuji, to the USA
welcome.detail: I'm a Philadelphia based software engineer. I got my start just outside of Tokyo and transitioned to software engineering. Come learn about my journey!
welcome.name: Bryan Aument.

about.school: I started out 6,700 miles across the globe in education. I participated in the Japan Exchange and Teaching program (JET) for 3 years in Yamanashi Prefecture.
about.tech: Before Japan I studied international relations and Japanese at The Pennsylvania State University. After returning from Japan I studied computer science at the Millersville University.
